snippet.title: TimeSplitters 2 Redux v0.1 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Homefront: The Revolution's PC port of TimeSplitters 2 gets a massive overhaul in this collaboration project! The TS2 Redux Team is proud to release v0.1, featuring fixes, improvements, and mods for Homefront's TS2 port! Crash fixes, enhanced textures, and game-changing mods are but a few of the additions you'll find in this huge revamp of the original!

Boot straight into TS2 and skip the Homefront menu! Activate cheats, browse through the gallery, and complete NeoTokyo without stability issues! Play TS1's Chemical Plant level with TS2's mechanics and characters! Try out dozens of mods, including a remastered version of the TS2 Remix Mod! 

Multiplayer and MapMaker are not yet available in this release. We are still figuring out how to make them work (and whether they actually work in the Homefront port). Version 0.1 is limited to Story, Arcade, and Challenges.

Download v0.1 here: https://github.com/HFTSRedux/TS2Redux

Join the TimeSplitters Online Discord to keep up with the project, submit bug reports, and chat with other TS fans! https://discord.gg/SauttVZ5Jx
